name: Corrupted Space - LOWREZ edition
description:
You hate trash and bacteria. And well, your home area got corrupted… It’s time for a big clean out, tho it’s not so easy to navigate in it, as it was before. Explore 31 level, jump on pads, ignore physic rules, and just have fun 

If you wonder, it's a version of Corrupted Space with lowrez mode enabled by default

 Controls 
  • Left/right - move
  • Up/down - manage gravity
  • X - switches gravity (hotkey for up/down)
  • Tab - show your time and level
  • P/enter - pause, as well as music/sfx muting and progress reset
